Hexxagon.Controller

Interface IGameController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameController

    public interface IGameController
    Contains generalised methods of controller layer of MVC design pattern.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFaceBoard(IFaceBoard faceBoard)
      Adds a face board visual component to the controller.
      void addInfoBoard(IInfoBoard infoBoard)
      Adds a info board visual component to the controller.
      void addPlayBoard(IPlayBoard playBoard)
      Adds a play board visual component to the controller.
      void autoPlayerCellStep(int fromColumnIndex, int fromRowIndex, int targetColumnIndex, int targetRowIndex, byte playerIndex)
      Informs the controller module about a step from a position to another one.
      void cellClicked(int columnIndex, int rowIndex)
      Informs the controller module about that a cell was clicked by a human player.
      void continueGame()
      Allows to continue the game.
      boolean isGameRunning()
      Tells whether the game is active.
      void pauseGame()
      Interrupts the game.

      Sets the data component of the game.

      Starts the game play.
      void stopGame()
      Stops the game.

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        void startGame()
        throws TError
        Starts the game play.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • pauseGame

        void pauseGame()
        throws TError
        Interrupts the game. If invoked in inappropriate game state than TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • continueGame

        void continueGame()
           throws TError
        Allows to continue the game. If invoked in inappropriate game state than TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • stopGame

        void stopGame()
       throws TError
        Stops the game. If invoked in inappropriate game state than TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • isGameRunning

        boolean isGameRunning()
               throws TError
        Tells whether the game is active. If a game is not active than no human or artificial player can invoke events.
        Returns:
        True if the game is running otherwise false.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • autoPlayerCellStep

        void autoPlayerCellStep(int fromColumnIndex,
                        int fromRowIndex,
                        int targetColumnIndex,
                        int targetRowIndex,
                        byte playerIndex)
                 throws TError
        Informs the controller module about a step from a position to another one. This method is used only by artificial player.
        Parameters:
        fromColumnIndex - Column index of the cell from where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        fromRowIndex - Row index of the cell from where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        targetColumnIndex - Column index of the cell to where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        targetRowIndex - Row index of the cell to where the step is taken. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        playerIndex - The unique index of player. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • cellClicked

        void cellClicked(int columnIndex,
                 int rowIndex)
          throws TError
        Informs the controller module about that a cell was clicked by a human player. This method is used only by the human player.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column index of the cell clicked. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        rowIndex - Row index of the cell clicked. Index should be a valid one otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • setGameData

        void setGameData(IGameData gameData)
          throws TError
        Sets the data component of the game. Only one data component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Parameters:
        gameData - An object instance of class implementing IGameData interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addPlayBoard

        void addPlayBoard(IPlayBoard playBoard)
           throws TError
        Adds a play board visual component to the controller. Play board is the visual interface on which the balls are placed. More than one play board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Parameters:
        playBoard - An object instance of class implementing IPlayBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addInfoBoard

        void addInfoBoard(IInfoBoard infoBoard)
           throws TError
        Adds a info board visual component to the controller. Info board is the visual interface on which the actual points of players are presented. More than one info board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Parameters:
        infoBoard - An object instance of class implementing IInfoBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • addFaceBoard

        void addFaceBoard(IFaceBoard faceBoard)
           throws TError
        Adds a face board visual component to the controller. Face board is the visual interface on which the artificial player is presented. More than one info board component is allowed to being attached to controller.
        Parameters:
        faceBoard - An object instance of class implementing IFaceBoard interface. Parameter should not be null otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
